name: Coconut Crunch Delight
steps: Combine first five ingredients. Press into greased 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350 for 20-25 min. Stirring every 10 min to form coarse crumbs. Cool.
Divide with 2/3 mixture in same pan.
Mix puddings and milk then add whipped topping. Pour over crust mixture.
Top with remaining crust mixture. Garnish with strawberries if desired
